org.phantomapi.game

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhantomGame

    public interface Game
    Represents a game instance
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameController getController()
      Get the game controller.
      GamePlugin getPlugin()
      Get the parent controller object or plugin
      GameState getState()
      Get the game state.
      GameStatus getStatus()
      Get the game status
      void setStatus(GameStatus status)
      Set the game status.
      void startGame(String... lauchParameters)
      Start the game up after it's been initialized
      void stopGame(String... endParameters)
      Stop the game

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        void startGame(String... lauchParameters)
        Start the game up after it's been initialized
        Parameters:
        lauchParameters - the start parameters can be used for multi game environments or startup options. These are not needed for every type of game, no need to use them

      • stopGame

        void stopGame(String... endParameters)
        Stop the game
        Parameters:
        endParameters - these are used for passing data to the game when stopped, once again, not always needed, but they are there if needed

      • getPlugin

        GamePlugin getPlugin()
        Get the parent controller object or plugin
        Returns:
        the game plugin

      • getController

        GameController getController()
        Get the game controller. Used for handling the game and processing things that happen along with the event bus
        Returns:
        the game controller

      • getState

        GameState getState()
        Get the game state. Used for holding objects, data and status information. Also for configurations and settings
        Returns:
        the game state

      • getStatus

        GameStatus getStatus()
        Get the game status
        Returns:
        the status of this game instance

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(GameStatus status)
        Set the game status. Used for informing other handlers that the game has either started or has ended for async startups
        Parameters:
        status - the game instance status
